sections.description:
Tutsup Epub Creator Free allows you to create EPUB e-books using your WordPress posts. You can search, add and organize posts into your e-book. You can add a cover image and set the book details. It makes it easier for you to create e-books for your readers, so they can read your content using e-book readers like Google Play Books or Calibre.

If you want to email me: todoespacoonline[at]gmail[dot]com.

Our website in Portuguese is http://www.tutsup.com/ .
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin zip file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Access the menu “Epub Creator” under “Posts”
  4. Configure your e-book data
  5. You can use the WordPress Media Uploader to set your book cover if you want
  6. Find your posts and drag to the book pages
  7. Click the button to create your e-book (under everything) and download it
  8. Now you have an Epub e-book from your WordPress posts
  9. You can use Google Play Books, Calibre or any e-book reader to test it
